full_text: Hitchcock spent much of his time cultivating his brand. His mischievous face dominated promotional materials for “Psycho” and “The Birds” https://t.co/QQN0PfOSlU

希区柯克花了很多时间培养自己的品牌。他那张调皮的脸占据了《惊魂记》和《鸟》的宣传资料https://t.co/QQN0PfOSlU。
